metadata.title: CVE-2023-2190 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.10 before 15.11.10, all versions starting from 16.0 before16.0.6, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.1. It may be possiblefor users to view new commits to private projects in a fork created whilethe project was public.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
